questionTitle: You can learn as much theory as you like, but you only master a skill by ________ it a lot.
I'm afraid a rise in salary is ________ just now.
I'll ________ the children for you while you are out.
John and Barbara ________ to get married in St Mark's church.
Have you a rough ________ of how many people are coming to the party?
As the waiter crossed the restaurant, he ________ over someone's foot and dropped his tray.
When he heard the terrible noise he asked me what was ________ on.
I don't think that red dress ________ her.
He ________ a very interesting story.
In pain as a result of the fall, he ________ slowly home.
Two ________ beers, please.
"Blood-________ are urgently required," the spokesman for the hospital said.
She was so poor that she had to wander the streets and ________ for money.
I don't agree ________ you.
She's accustomed ________ living in comfort.
I drew a lot of money ________ the bank yesterday.
I wouldn't have been ill if I ________ on that trip.
The doctor arranged for me to see the ________ at the hospital about the pain in my back.
I'm really angry with the way I've been treated by this company. I've had it up to ________ with the way I've been treated.
Although he seemed convincing, I was somewhat suspicious ________ his over-confident manner.
